daryl_dixon Go ahead and what ? I mean just go ! I do n't want you here ! You 're a real piece of work , lady . What , are you gon na make this about my daddy or some crap like that ? Pfft ! Man , you know Jack . You 're afraid . You 're afraid . 'Cause you 're all alone . You got no husband , no daughter . You do n't know what to do with yourself . You ai n't my problem ! Sophia was n't mine ! All you had to do was keep an eye on her !

andrea_harrison Come on .
lori_grimes Thank you . Hey . I am so sorry that I left without telling you .

lori_grimes Not for a while . You must have a lot of questions , huh ? We never had the talk . I guess we forgot .

shane_walsh Hey , dude . Hey , I 'm sorry , bud . Okay ? I thought you know .
carl_grimes Big brother Carl . Pretty cool , huh ?
shane_walsh I say that 's very cool .
shane_walsh You -- you mind if I talk to your mom a sec ? Hmm ?
andrea_harrison How about a little later after she 's had some rest ?
shane_walsh Lori , I had to get you back here . You would n't have come otherwise . How about you -- how about you just hear me out , please ? It 's okay .
lori_grimes Okay . Give me a minute .
shane_walsh Thanks , bud .
shane_walsh Okay , Lori , it was a lie . It was one little whit lie . But I think that -- I think you oughta be thinking about how lucky we are that your baby 's safe .
lori_grimes You just ca n't stop lying , can you ? My husband is back safe and sound . My husband is dead in some hospital .

shane_walsh Oh , when are you gonna -- when are you gon na stop throwing that in my face , huh ? I thought that he was -- the point here , Lor , is that you can not keep running off like that . What were you thinking ?
lori_grimes I was thinking we needed rick here to keep us safe .
shane_walsh Rick ? I keep you safe .
lori_grimes Like you did with Otis ? What happened that night ? You have n't been the same since .
shane_walsh You wanna know what happened with Otis ? What happened with Otis happened because I love you . I love you and I love Carl . That 's right .
lori_grimes I told rick .

shane_walsh What ? You told -- you told him what ? Did you tell him that you thought you were a widow ? That you were grieving and that the world was coming to an end ? That -- that you need comforting ? Did you tell him it was a mistake ?
lori_grimes Mm - hmm .
shane_walsh You know , Lori , that ai n't true . What we did , it was real .
lori_grimes It was not .
shane_walsh It was a long time coming . It was real , lori .
lori_grimes It was not .
shane_walsh It was you and it was me and Carl , and it was real . It was right . Do n't say it was n't .
lori_grimes It was n't .

shane_walsh Yeah ? Just think about what you felt , just for a second . What you fe -- what you felt . Everything falling apart all around us , but it -- it was the one good thing . And you know it 's true .
andrea_harrison How is she ?
patricia Dehydrated . I 'll set up an IV . Best I can do without hershel .
maggie_greene Hey .
andrea_harrison Can I get you anything ?
maggie_greene Nah , I just wish my dad was here .
andrea_harrison She 'll be okay . You just need to be strong for her .
maggie_greene I was just reminding her about -- never mind .
andrea_harrison No no . I -- I'd love to hear .

maggie_greene My dad would die if he heard this . My first summer back from college , I drove home , dumped my stuff off , went straight out to the stable for a ride . My family comes back from church and Beth grabs my things and starts unpacking my stuff upstairs .
andrea_harrison That 's sweet .

maggie_greene Yeah , until this one here starts rifling through my backpack . She finds this little plastic container with these pink and green candies inside . She did n't even know I was on the pill . She was so freaked out by the idea of me , boys and sex that she runs outside and chucks them in the duck pond . And I ride up , I see this , I 'm screaming . She 's crying and Shawn runs outside , thinks one of us is drowning . Soon as he figures out what 's going on , the jerk busts out laughing so loud that my horse rears up and gets mud all over the three of us . My dad comes out , """" what the heck is going on out here ? ! """" And she turns around , bats her eyelids and says , """" we 're just swimming , daddy . """" In her Sunday dress , all covered in snot and mud .
andrea_harrison rick and glenn will get your dad back .

andrea_harrison Yeah . He is .

dale_horvath He does n't want rick back , or Hershel . With them gone , he 's got everything he wants and no one to tell him otherwise .
andrea_harrison shane has done more to keep this group alive than anybody , including rick .
dale_horvath You ca n't possibly believe that .
andrea_harrison I do .

carl_grimes Dad !
maggie_greene You 're okay .

glenn_rhee That 's randall .

glenn_rhee It 's gotten bad in town .
andrea_harrison What do we do with him ?

rick_grimes When he is , we give him a canteen , take him out to the main road , send him on his way .
andrea_harrison Is n't that the same as leaving him for the walkers ?
rick_grimes He 'll have a fighting chance .
shane_walsh Just gon na let him go ? He knows where we are .
rick_grimes He was blindfolded the whole way here . He 's not a threat .
shane_walsh Not a threat . How many of them were there ? You killed three of their men , you took one of them hostage , but they just ai n't gon na come looking ?
rick_grimes They left him for dead . No one is looking .
theodore_douglas We should still post a guard .
hershel_greene He 's out cold right now , will be for hours .
shane_walsh You know what ? I 'm gon na go get him some flowers and candy . Look at this , folks -- we back in fantasyland .

hershel_greene You know , we have n't even dealt with what you did at my barn yet . Let me make this perfectly clear , once and for all -- this is my farm . Now I wanted you gone . rick talked me out of it , but that does n't mean I have to like it . So do us both a favor -- keep your mouth shut .
rick_grimes We 're not gon na do anything about it today . Let 's just cool off .
maggie_greene Can I talk to you ? What 's going on with you ?
glenn_rhee Your dad saved my life today . And rick saved us both . And I -- I froze .
maggie_greene Well , you were being shot at .
glenn_rhee I know , but-- .
maggie_greene You do n't have anything to prove .
glenn_rhee All I 've done , then this -- okay . It 's because of what you said .
maggie_greene That I love you ?
glenn_rhee Yeah . A bullet hit the wall behind me and I -- I thought of you -- losing me , hurting . And I could n't take it , so I hid to stay alive .
maggie_greene glenn .
glenn_rhee No no no . No , you do n't get it . Rick , your dad -- they were counting on me and I -- I only thought of myself .
hershel_greene Has she eaten ? I 'll give her a sedative -- stop her body from working too hard .
maggie_greene You were drinking .
hershel_greene That was the least of my worries .
maggie_greene You left and I did n't know what to do !
andrea_harrison Want me to take watch ?
shane_walsh Yeah . Relieve it . In a few hours . I 'm gon na take the graveyard .
andrea_harrison And then what ? We just send him on his merry way ?
shane_walsh According to rick and hershel .
andrea_harrison If he finds his people and leads them here , we 'll have a war on our hands .
shane_walsh You know you 're preaching to the choir , girl .

andrea_harrison You ever consider a lighter touch ? Abandoning the search for Sophia , taking out the walkers in the barn , lying to lori today -- those were all the right calls . It 's your presentation that leaves something to be desired .
shane_walsh dale send you ?
andrea_harrison I see you pushing everyone away . For what ? They need you .
shane_walsh Huh . I 'll always be the odd man out -- the same as you .
andrea_harrison I 've made my peace .

shane_walsh Have you ? The way I see it , you and me , we -- we're treated the same way . Everyone 's always trying to take the gun out of your hand . These folks -- they want to play house . They wanna pretend that rick and Hershel -- they know what they 're doing lemme tell you something -- they bound to get us all killed .
andrea_harrison Then we have to stop that .

shane_walsh They do n't listen . They 're gon na give this kid a care package . They 're gon na send him on his way . And you right , that 's gon na bring on a war or something worse , and we just gonna -- we're gon na sit here and wait for it . But you and me , we -- we're the only ones who see it coming . I should 've left with you when I had the chance .
rick_grimes Oh . Oh man .
lori_grimes Come here .
rick_grimes Thank you . Ah .
rick_grimes Ooh .
lori_grimes Need your help .
rick_grimes Come here .
lori_grimes Ah . Oh .
rick_grimes We 're like a couple of old people .
lori_grimes We need to talk about shane .
rick_grimes What 's he done now ?
lori_grimes He thinks the baby 's his . No matter what , it 's yours .
rick_grimes He 'll accept that .
lori_grimes You 're gon na have to make him . He wo n't listen to me . He 's delusional and he 's dangerous . When I went looking for you , he came after me .
rick_grimes Well , of course he did .

lori_grimes . And lied to me to get me back here , said you were already back . You saw what he did at the barn . He 's threatened dale and Hershel . He 's scaring people and he 's scaring me . And I think he killed Otis . I think he left him behind and I think -- I think he did it not just to save carl but because he loves me .
rick_grimes But you do n't know that .
lori_grimes . And he thinks that we 're supposed to be together no matter what .
rick_grimes Those gunmen left that kid behind today . I killed two people myself because of you , carl and the baby . It was gon na be me and not them no matter what .
lori_grimes You killed the living to protect what 's yours ?
rick_grimes That 's right .
lori_grimes shane thinks I 'm his . He thinks the baby 's his . And he says you ca n't protect us , that you 're gon na get us killed . He 's dangerous , Rick , and he wo n't stop .
